data.Sentence_cn: 我的老朋友哈里森在回到英国以前曾多年居住在地中海地区。
data.Sentence: My old friend, Harrison, had lived in the Mediterranean for many years before he returned to England.

data.Sentence_cn: 过去他常幻想退休后到英国，并计划在乡间安顿下来。
data.Sentence: He had often dreamed of retiring in England and had planned to settle down in the country.

data.Sentence_cn: 他刚一回到英国便买下了一幢房子住了进去。
data.Sentence: He had no sooner returned than he bought a house and went to live there.

data.Sentence_cn: 但紧接着他就开始抱怨那里的天气了。
data.Sentence: Almost immediately he began to complain about the weather,

data.Sentence_cn: 因为即使那时仍为夏季，但雨总是下个不停，而且常常冷得厉害。
data.Sentence: for even though it was still summer, it rained continually and it was often bitterly cold.

data.Sentence_cn: 在阳光下生活了那么多年的哈里森对此感到惊奇。
data.Sentence: After so many years of sunshine, Harrison got a shock.

data.Sentence_cn: 他的举动就好像他从未在英国生活过一样。
data.Sentence: He acted as if he had never lived in England before.
In the end, it was more than he could bear.

data.Sentence_cn: 还没等安顿下来就卖掉了房子，离开了这个国家。
data.Sentence: He had hardly had time to settle down when he sold the house and left the country.

data.Sentence_cn: 他多年来的幻想从此破灭。
data.Sentence: The dream he had had for so many years ended there.

data.Sentence_cn: 哈里森把每件事情都考虑到了，唯独没想到天气。
data.Sentence: Harrison had thought of everything except the weather.
